about_the_game:
Skyfighter Arcade

Shoot. Dodge. Upgrade. Repeat - classic skyfighter shoot-em-up with a twist!

Skyfighter Arcade is the classic top-down shoot-em-up vertical scroller, with a twist. Outmaneuver increasingly difficult enemies and obstacles. Blast your enemies out of the sky with powerful and unique weapons. Upgrade your weapons and ship to make yourself more powerful. Execute stunning combo attacks to get yourself out of a bind

Skyfighter Arcade is simple but will keep you entertained and coming back for more. Can you survive just a little bit longer? Will your new upgrades get you through to new levels?

Exciting Features Include

  • Exciting Weapons - Each weapon carries with it its own unique characteristics and abilities! Choose from a rapid fire laser that can reflect enemy attacks, to homing missiles that cause splash damage; to unique energy mines that will snag enemies coming your way
  • Devastating Special Attacks - Get rewarded for excellent maneuvering skills with energy for your special attacks! Perfectly dodge enemy attacks to fill up your special meter and execute a devastating attack!
  • Customizable Loadouts - Use the right tool for the job! Choose between a wide selection of weapons and equipment, and choose how you want to slot your weapons!
  • Wager System - will you push on past your current play session to earn bonus coins? Will you risk what you've won for more, or will you play it safe?
  • Support for multiple input types -- control your skyfighter with mouse, keyboard, gamepad, or even touch!

Features We're Working On

  • Multiplayer - hop in with your friends for a grand time blasting enemies! Have a hard round that you just can't get through? Have your friends join in and help you
  • Weapon Packs - more weapons for more ways to annihlate your enemies! Use different weapons together to find new and creative methods of destruction!
  • New Skyfighters - new skyfighters with their own abilities and special weapons for you to unlock and try!
  • Customization and Personalization - color and design your skyfighter that represents you!
  • Boss fights and raids - take on uniquely crafted boss enemies that will reward you immensely!
  • What do you want? Let us know what features you'd like to see too!

name: Skyfighter Arcade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
